form.label: [Firewall] Automatic lookup database
form.description: This dashboard is used to generate the database used to enrich data with an automatic lookup

panel.title: Last extract time over the last 7 days

search.query: `checkpoint_api_get_events($input_name$,*,*,*,*)` | stats earliest(_time) as et, latest(_time) as lt, count by input_uid | eval et=round(relative_time(et,"-1min")), lt=round(relative_time(lt,"+1min")), details = strftime(et,"%F")+" - "+strftime(et,"%H:%M:%S")+" to "+strftime(lt,"%H:%M:%S"), name = "$input_name$" | sort -lt | table name, input_uid, details, et, lt, count | rename name as "Input Name", input_uid as "Input UID", details as "Time range details", count as "Number of events"

table.fields: ["Input Name","Input UID","Time range details","Number of events"]

input.label: Is the following preview good for you? If yes, it will generate the new output for the selected input in the database

search.query: `checkpoint_api_get_events($input_name$,$uid$,*,network_objects,*)` AND NOT type IN ("address-range","dns-domain","dynamic-object","group","multicast-address-range","opsec-application","security-zone","tag","time","time-group") | rename mask-length4 as mask4, ipv4-address as ipv4, mask-length6 as mask6, ipv6-address as ipv6 | eval mask = case(isnotnull(subnet4),mask4,isnotnull(subnet6),mask6,1==1,"32"), network = case(isnotnull(subnet4),subnet4+"/"+tostring(mask),isnotnull(ipv4),ipv4+"/"+mask,isnotnull(subnet6),subnet6+"/"+tostring(mask),isnotnull(ipv6),ipv6+"/"+mask,1==1,"Unknown"), firewall_object = input_name+if(input_domain!="","_"+input_domain,"")+" / "+name, size = len(name) | sort 0 -mask -size input_domain | eval comments = if(isnull(comments) OR comments=="","None",comments) | table input_name, input_domain, type, network, firewall_object, comments, mask, size

table.title: Output of the new database (with all entries)

search.query: | inputlookup ckpt_firewall_objects_database.csv | where input_name!="$input_name$" | append [| loadjob $new_database_output$] | sort 0 -mask -size input_domain | outputlookup ckpt_firewall_objects_database.csv | table input_name, input_domain, type, network, firewall_object, comments, mask, size
